main.name: Brendan Mills
main.occupation: ReactJS Developer, PHP, Symfony, Firebase and MySQL
main.description: Full Stack ReactJS Developer, Founder && Freelancer by Night.
main.bio: My name is Brendan, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer.  I am base in Hamilton, New Zealand.  I have customer and retail experience, with experience managing staff.  My background is in full stack development and visual design.  My hunger for knowledge and determination to turn information into action.  I currently working as a freelancing full stack developer and is always interested in a challenge.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.description: Complete real-world projects and make a modern Javascript and React JS web developer. Other Tools use Firebase, MongoDB, Heroku and Material UI

work.title: Grocery/SAP Champ/Accountant

work.company: Mill Street Food Warehouse (Trading as Pak N Save Mill Street)
work.title: Grocery All Rounder
work.description: Did all things grocery... from the botton to the top with IT on the side. Roles include Grocery 2IC, Buyer, Duty Mangaer(Saturdays), Building Security, Price Integrity, Storeroom, Forklift Driver, Grocery Assistant, Trolley Boy(usally public holidays), IT roles include looking after the Alarm System, Helping staff with internal computer issues, Invoice to Email

testimonials.text: Brendan promotes a high level of customer service while maintaining a good working relationship with fellow staff members.  He is an honest, reliable and punctual employee who always took pride in his appearance and set high standards for himself.

Whilst only a short term Brendan has proven to be totally reliable and trustworthy.  On Occasions releived as supercisor over a team of three other part-time staff, and been responsible to lock and secure the premises.  Needless to say he can be left to work unattended and have the work completed on time and to a very high standard.

In that time he has impressed me as a conscientious and hard working student.  His work is always well presented and shows considerable effort and thought.  .... His work as a librarian in the school library and his assistance with school computer equipment has been appreciated. ... Although he is quiet and a little reserved he has a good sense of humour.  His manner is generally cheerful and positive.

Brendan is well mannered, punctual and very patient in explaining how to use software programmes.  He has a good relationship with Staff and Students and has a very helpful manner.  I have greatlly appreciated his willing and cheerful help.  His knowledge of computers has been invaluable
